sqlMap.select: select OC_ID as ocId, DATE_FORMAT(OC_POST_TIME,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%m:%s') as ocPost_time, odq.OD_NAME as ocRequestOfficeName, odr.OD_NAME as ocReceiveOfficeName, OC_POST_NAME as ocPost_name, OC_POST_AGE as ocPost_age, OC_SEX as ocSex, OC_POST_SUBJECT as ocPost_subject, OC_DESC as ocDesc, OS_ANSWERED as osAnswered, OS_ANSWER as osAnswer, OS_ANSWER_OFFICE as osAnswer_office, DATE_FORMAT(OS_ANSWER_TIME,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%m:%s') as osAnswer_time, OS_TYPICAL as osTypical from EMPLOYEE_RECRUITMENT oc left join OFFICE_DETAIL odq on oc.OC_REQUEST_OFFICE =odq.OD_ID left join OFFICE_DETAIL odr on oc.OC_RECEIVE_OFFICE =odr.OD_ID

select OC_ID as ocId, DATE_FORMAT(OC_POST_TIME,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%m:%s') as ocPost_time, odq.OD_NAME as ocRequestOfficeName, odr.OD_NAME as ocReceiveOfficeName, OC_POST_NAME as ocPost_name, OC_POST_AGE as ocPost_age, OC_SEX as ocSex, OC_POST_SUBJECT as ocPost_subject, OC_DESC as ocDesc, OS_ANSWERED as osAnswered, OS_ANSWER as osAnswer, OS_ANSWER_OFFICE as osAnswer_office, DATE_FORMAT(OS_ANSWER_TIME,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%m:%s') as osAnswer_time, OS_TYPICAL as osTypical from EMPLOYEE_RECRUITMENT oc left join OFFICE_DETAIL odq on oc.OC_REQUEST_OFFICE =odq.OD_ID left join OFFICE_DETAIL odr on oc.OC_RECEIVE_OFFICE =odr.OD_ID WHERE OC_ID = #ocId#

oc.OC_REQUEST_OFFICE = #ocRequest_office#
oc.OC_RECEIVE_OFFICE = #ocReceive_office#

select OC_ID as ocId, DATE_FORMAT(OC_POST_TIME,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%m:%s') as ocPost_time, odq.OD_NAME as ocRequestOfficeName, odr.OD_NAME as ocReceiveOfficeName, OC_POST_NAME as ocPost_name, OC_POST_AGE as ocPost_age, OC_SEX as ocSex, OC_POST_SUBJECT as ocPost_subject, OC_DESC as ocDesc, OS_ANSWERED as osAnswered, OS_ANSWER as osAnswer, OS_ANSWER_OFFICE as osAnswer_office, DATE_FORMAT(OS_ANSWER_TIME,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%m:%s') as osAnswer_time, OS_TYPICAL as osTypical from EMPLOYEE_RECRUITMENT oc left join OFFICE_DETAIL odq on oc.OC_REQUEST_OFFICE =odq.OD_ID left join OFFICE_DETAIL odr on oc.OC_RECEIVE_OFFICE =odr.OD_ID
oc.OC_REQUEST_OFFICE = #condition.ocRequest_office#
oc.OC_RECEIVE_OFFICE = #condition.ocReceive_office#
oc.OS_ANSWER_TIME > #condition.ocPostStartTime#
oc.OS_ANSWER_TIME < #condition.ocPostEndTime#

ORDER BY OC_POST_TIME, OS_ANSWER_TIME LIMIT #start#,#pageSize#
